DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.SO_ID) FROM SD_SalesOrder T1 INNER JOIN SM_Organization T2 ON T2.Org_ID = T1.SO_Org_ID AND T2.Org_IsValid = 1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT T31.SOD_SO_ID, T31.SOD_StockInOrgID 'AROrgID', T31.SOD_StockInOrgCode 'AROrgCode', T31.SOD_StockInOrgName 'AROrgName' FROM SD_SalesOrderDetail T31 WHERE T31.SOD_IsValid = 1 ) T3 ON T3.SOD_SO_ID = T1.SO_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T41.ARB_SrcBillNo, SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) 'ARB_AccountReceivableAmount', SUM(ISNULL(T41.ARB_ReceivedAmount, 0)) 'ARB_ReceivedAmount' FROM FM_AccountReceivableBill T41 WHERE T41.ARB_IsValid = 1 AND T41.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND T41.ARB_SourceTypeName != '其他应收（赔偿）' AND T41.ARB_BillDirectName = '负向' GROUP BY T41.ARB_SrcBillNo, T41.ARB_BillDirectName ) T4 ON T4.ARB_SrcBillNo = T1.SO_No LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T51.AFC_ID 'CustomerID', CASE T51.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN '平台内汽修商' WHEN 0 THEN '一般汽修商户' END 'CustomerType', T51.AFC_Code 'AutoFactoryCode', T51.AFC_Name 'AutoFactoryName', T51.AFC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo', T51.AFC_CreditAmount 'CreditAmount', T51.AFC_AutoPartsPriceType 'AutoPartsPriceType' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T51 WHERE T51.AFC_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T52.GC_ID 'CustomerID', '普通客户' 'CustomerType', NULL 'AutoFactoryCode', NULL 'AutoFactoryName', T52.GC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo', T52.GC_CreditAmount 'CreditAmount', T52.GC_AutoPartsPriceType 'AutoPartsPriceType' FROM PIS_GeneralCustomer T52 WHERE T52.GC_IsValid = 1 ) T5 ON T5.CustomerType = T1.SO_CustomerTypeName AND T5.CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T61.SO_CustomerID, SUM(ISNULL(T62.ARB_AccountReceivableAmount, 0)) 'DebtAmount' FROM SD_SalesOrder T61 INNER JOIN FM_AccountReceivableBill T62 ON T62.ARB_SrcBillNo = T61.SO_No AND T62.ARB_ApprovalStatusName = '已审核' AND T62.ARB_IsValid = 1 WHERE T61.SO_IsValid = 1 AND ( T61.SO_StatusName = '交易成功' OR T61.SO_StatusName = '已关闭' ) GROUP BY T61.SO_CustomerID ) T6 ON T6.SO_CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID LEFT JOIN EWM_Wallet T7 ON T7.Wal_CustomerID = T1.SO_CustomerID AND T7.Wal_IsValid = 1 WHERE T1.SO_IsValid = 1 AND T1.SO_SourceTypeName LIKE '%退货%'
T1.SO_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_No#+'%'
T1.SO_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SO_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.SO_SourceTypeName =#WHERE_SO_SourceTypeName#
